atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities, and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which bucket a set of custom styles belongs to.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Use the @config directive to specify which config file Tailwind should use when compiling that CSS file.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use the @theme directive to define custom design tokens for your project in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Use @custom-variant to define custom variants in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @plugin
atDirectives.description: Use @plugin to load a Tailwind CSS plugin in v4.

atDirectives.name: @source
atDirectives.description: Use @source to specify content sources in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @utility
atDirectives.description: Use @utility to define custom utilities in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @variant
atDirectives.description: Use @variant to apply variants to nested CSS in Tailwind CSS v4.
